fields.description:
I took a project from bitbucket account and imported in Titanium studio.When am trying to run the project on iOS simulator am getting an error.I tried searching for the solution and even tried few thing but still getting same error.Other projects are working fine.

{color:red}[ERROR] :  Invalid --device-id value E52EBCF2-D9AB-40AC-ACC2-60D5EB131A8C
Available iOS Simulators:
For help, run: titanium.js help build{color}
fields.environment:
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.13.1
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 4
  Memory                      = 8589934592
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 8.9.3
  npm Version                 = 6.0.1
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.0.14
Titanium SDK
  SDK Version                 = 7.0.1.GA
  SDK Path                    = /Users/sonu/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/7.0.1.GA
  Target Platform             = iphone

comments.body: Sounds like the project has a launch configuration that includes a Simulator that is not installed on your machine. You should remove the old launch configuration create one for your environment.
